en: O Jehovah my God, in thee do I take refuge: Save me from all them that pursue me, and deliver me,
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, nangmaa chun ka ringna kân nghat a, A mi hnawttuhai po poa inthawk hin mi sandamin, mi humhim rawh.

en: Lest they tear my soul like a lion, Rending it in pieces, while there is none to deliver.
hmr: Chuong naw chun, sanhimtu um loin, sakeibaknei angin, Ka hringna hi keinawiin, sawisa rawi an tih.

en: O Jehovah my God, if I have done this; If there be iniquity in my hands;
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, hi hi thaw ka lo nih a, Ka kutah suolna um a lo nih a,

en: If I have rewarded evil unto him that was at peace with me (Yea, I have delivered him that without cause was mine adversary);
hmr: Kei le inremtaka um chu suola thung ka lo ni chun, (Anih, san nei loa a mi dotuhai hi ka sanhim a ni lem a nih)

en: Let the enemy pursue my soul, and overtake it; Yea, let him tread my life down to the earth, And lay my glory in the dust. [Selah
hmr: Hmêlma chun ka hringna chu hnawtin, hnawt phâk el raw se; Anih, ka hringna hi hnuoia chun chîlthluin, Ka ropuina hi pilvut lai sie el raw se.

en: Arise, O Jehovah, in thine anger; Lift up thyself against the rage of mine adversaries, And awake for me; thou hast commanded judgment.
hmr: Aw LALPA, lunginsenin tho la, A mi dotuhai lunginsenna doin inthawk la, Ka ta dingin insukhar la, rorêl- na ding thu i pêk ta sih a.

en: And let the congregation of the peoples compass thee about; And over them return thou on high.
hmr: Chuongchun, mi tin inkhâwm- hai chun inhuol vêl hai sienla che. Chun, nang chu an chungah chungtieng chun kîr nâwk rawh.

en: Jehovah ministereth judgment to the peoples: Judge me, O Jehovah, according to my righteousness, and to mine integrity that is in me.
hmr: LALPA chun mi tin chungah ro a rêl hlak; Aw LALPA, keimaa felna le, ka lungrila ṭhatna um ang peiin ro mi rêlpêk la;

en: Oh let the wickedness of the wicked come to an end, but establish thou the righteous: For the righteous God trieth the minds and hearts.
hmr: Aw mi rilohai rîtlona chu hung tâwp ta sienla, mi felhai ruok chu sukdet rawh. Pathien feltak chun lungrilhai le lungvarhai chu a fie hlak sih a.

en: My shield is with God, Who saveth the upright in heart.
hmr: Ka phaw chu Pathien kuomah a um a; Ama chu lungril indiktak put sandamtu a nih.

en: God is a righteous judge, Yea, a God that hath indignation every day.
hmr: Pathien chu rorêltu feltak a na, Anih, ni tina mi suolhai chunga lungninawna nei hlak Pathien a nih.

en: If a man turn not, he will whet his sword; He hath bent his bow, and made it ready;
hmr: Mi chu a nghakîr naw chun ama chun a kâwlhnâm tâtngei a ta, A thalngul chu a kuoi a, a siemrêl tah a.

en: He hath also prepared for him the instruments of death; He maketh his arrows fiery shafts.
hmr: Thina hriemhreihai chu ama thatna dingin a siem diem ta bawk a; A thalhai chu chawk theiin a siem a.

en: Behold, he travaileth with iniquity; Yea, he hath conceived mischief, and brought forth falsehood.
hmr: En ta, suolna hasein a um a, Anih, thil suksuolna a vawn a, khêlthu a nei tah a.

en: He hath made a pit, and digged it, And is fallen into the ditch which he made.
hmr: Khur a siem a, inthûktakin a cho a, Ama hum siema chun a tla tah a.

en: His mischief shall return upon his own head, And his violence shall come down upon his own pate.
hmr: A thil suksuolna chu ama lu chung ngeia chun hung kîr nâwk a ta, Nunsetaka a thilthaw chu ama lusîpa ngei hung tlâng a tih.

en: I will give thanks unto Jehovah according to his righteousness, And will sing praise to the name of Jehovah Most High.
hmr: LALPA chu a felna lei hin a kuomah lâwmthu hril ka ta, LALPA Achunghnungtak hming inpâkin sak bawk ka tih.
